curam.util.persistence.helper

Class Transition<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.persistence.helper.Transition<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The type of the value used to signify the state of the state machine.

    public abstract class Transition<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the processing specific to a particular permitted state transition for a state machine.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Transition(State<V> from, State<V> to)
      Protected constructor for use by anonymous classes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State<V> getFromState()
      Gets the state transitioned from (under this transition).
      State<V> getToState()
      Gets the state transitioned to (under this transition).
      protected void onTransition()
      Notifies the implementation that the state machine is undergoing this transition.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transition

        protected Transition(State<V> from,
                     State<V> to)
        Protected constructor for use by anonymous classes. Adds this transition to the outgoing transitions known to the Transition.from state.
        Parameters:
        from - the state transitioned from (under this transition).
        to - the state transitioned to (under this transition).

    • Method Detail

      • getFromState

        public State<V> getFromState()
        Gets the state transitioned from (under this transition).
        Returns:
        The state transitioned from (under this transition).

      • getToState

        public State<V> getToState()
        Gets the state transitioned to (under this transition).
        Returns:
        The state transitioned to (under this transition).

      • onTransition

        protected void onTransition()
        Notifies the implementation that the state machine is undergoing this transition. By default does nothing. Implementations may override to supply custom validation logic (or other processing) for this transition. Only processing specific to this transition should be placed in this method:
        • Processing which applies whenever the state machine transitions from a particular state to any other should be placed in an override of State.onLeave(); and
        • Processing which applies whenever the state machine transitions to a particular state from any other should be placed in an override of State.onEnter().
